p.font: Don't forget to checkout on the last page when you finished the quiz.

problem.p: The following multiple choice questions will mark anything you put in as correct.

multiplechoiceresponse.label: You run the bisection search code given in class to find an integer in a list of integers. The list is unordered. Which one of the following is true?

choicegroup.choice: The program always gives the wrong answer.
The program might give the wrong answer.

multiplechoiceresponse.label: Given the following code, which one of the following is true when the execution hits #POINT1 and #POINT2:
multiplechoiceresponse.pre: A = [1,1] B = A #POINT1 for e in B: A = A + A #POINT2

choicegroup.choice: At #POINT1, A is an alias for B and at #POINT2, A is an alias for B.
At #POINT1, A is an alias for B and at #POINT2, A is NOT an alias for B.
At #POINT1, A is NOT an alias for B and at #POINT2, A is an alias for B.
At #POINT1, A is NOT an alias for B and at #POINT2, A is NOT an alias for B.
